Key Match Events: Jake Rogers hit a solo homer in the second inning
Jake Rogers hit a three-run homer in the third inning
Joey Wentz won for the second time in 16 appearances since May 14
Alex Lange pitched a perfect ninth for his 24th save in 29 chances
Pre-Game Insights: The Angels were assured their eighth consecutive losing season
The Angels played without injured stars Shohei Ohtani and Mike Trout
Post-Match Reflections: The Tigers won for the sixth time in eight games and improved to 3-0 on a California trip
Rogers has 19 homers this season along with a pair of multihomer games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Angels' Randal Grichuk hit his 15th homer, a two-run drive in the sixth
Angels rookie Nolan Schanuel doubled to extend his club-record on-base streak to 22 games at the start of his career
